DOC.brief_summary: Characterization of green propolis and development of mouthwash containing propolis to control plaque and gingivitis. A Phase I.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of a Mouthwash Containing Propolis
DOC.detailed_description: Chemical characterization of propolis by HPLC (High-performance liquid chromatography), antimicrobial testing against pathogens and cariogenic. Studies in vitro on anti-inflammatory activity, cytotoxicity tests of green propolis.
DOC.criteria: age ranging from 18 to 60 years minimum of 20 natural teeth mean plaque index (PI)of at least 1.5 an average gingival index (GI), at least less than 1.0. Individuals with orthodontic appliances or removable dentures, Individuals whit tumors of soft tissue or hard mouth, and advanced periodontal disease, Indivuduals whit antibiotic therapy 2 weeks prior to study initiation, or with known hypersensitivity propolis are also excluded.
